description.raw:
changes to Nate's comments added.

Mainly a big merge into dev.  This patch also contains:
 - Fixes so bullet compiles.
 - Fix a start up deadlock race condition in ConnectionManager.
 - Fix some places where switching to Scoped joint names not complete.
 - Major refactor of JointController::SetJointPosition.  It's now much cleaner.
   - Added set_joint.cc and set_pose_loop.cc for testing purposes.
Hard to break up the merge into smaller patches because most of the changes came from different merges upstream.
description.html:
changes to Nate's comments added.

Mainly a big merge into dev. This patch also contains: - Fixes so bullet compiles. - Fix a start up deadlock race condition in ConnectionManager. - Fix some places where switching to Scoped joint names not complete. - Major refactor of JointController::SetJointPosition. It's now much cleaner. - Added set_joint.cc and set_pose_loop.cc for testing purposes. Hard to break up the merge into smaller patches because most of the changes came from different merges upstream.
